subject: RE: Image upload - RESOLVED (was Azure key)
body:
Hey Fulton,

Disregard my earlier urgent messages about EventsImageUpload.js.

**Root cause found**: The Azure Storage account key in local.settings.json was expired/rotated.

Once El Gotan updated the AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_KEY, image uploads work perfectly for all roles (RA, RO, SA).

**No backend code changes needed.** The EventsRA.js endpoint was already correctly using `...requestBody` spread which handles eventImage fine.

Sorry for the false alarm!

- Sarah
